attributes.action: TO review MMC and MTAS and the process of selection and wastage of medical talent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The MMC/MTAS process will sacrifice 8000 of the brightest and the best of  the young doctors available to fill the gap in the health care needs in thie countyr at a time when  despite  rising doctor mumbers, , doctor  avialavility in the NHS since 1997 has only risen by by 327  in real terms due to changes in working hours and contracts>  How can we lose lose 8000 of our brightest and our best?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
